copy.firstuse: Venues is a place to add event locations that can't be found in our venue database When you add an event to your calendar the venue field automatically searches the database as well as custom added venues here.
copy.quick_details: Quickly add a venue with just the basics,
copy.quick_details_3: add a venue with all details
copy.my_venues_description: Custom added venues not found in the CASH venue database.
